venue.address_2: same building as Head Games-If Free street door is locked-go around corner to entrance on Oak St.
venue.name: The Landing Center for Healing Arts

item.description:
Come experience Laughter Yoga in Portland!

try something new! Laughter Yoga is the practice of using laughter as a tool to experience better physical and mental well-being. Our brains do not know the difference between real laughter and fake laughter, so by practicing laughter for a sustained period of time you get all the same benefits of really laughing(and well, that usually happens too!) And did we mention, you will burn between 350-500 calories doing it?

Join us for a fun and energizing hour of levity and laughter!
Cost $15 (FREE if it is your first time at the Landing Center)
Come as you are. No mat needed.
contact: katie@katiewestlifedesign.com
item.name: INTRODUCTION TO LAUGHTER YOGA
